headline.main: At an Islamic School in Pakistan

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: As Thomas L. Friedman observed at Pakistan's largest Islamic boys' school, ''the real war for peace in this region, though, is in the schools'' (column, Nov. 13). What so many boys learn there is profoundly disturbing. Fortunately, it is only part of the picture.
abstract: David Morrison letter on Thomas L Friedman's Nov 13 column on Pakistan, and role of Islamic schools for boys in fostering extremism; holds an encouraging note is that increasing number of schools for girls are putting them on different path
